text: Musa Simelane (born 2 February 1974) is a Swazi boxer. Representing Swaziland at the 2000 Summer Olympics, Simelane was defeated in his first round bout against Argentine Israel Héctor Perez. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Swazi male boxers Category:Olympic boxers of Swaziland Category:Boxers at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Featherweight boxers
title: Musa Simelane
